wikipedia_page.main: Samantha Rose Simmonds (born 1972/1973) is an English newsreader, television presenter and journalist. She was a news anchor for Sky News until July 2016.

response: * Samantha Simmonds World News Today, The Briefing, Business Briefing, World Business Report, Worklife, BBC News, BBC World News, The Papers

World Business Report is a television business news programme produced by BBC News and shown on BBC World News, the BBC News Channel and BBC One on weekdays. There are two editions broadcast each weekday, at 0530 and 0630 GMT as a result of the COVID-19 pandemic. Each edition lasts 25 minutes. The main presenter of the programme is Sally Bundock and Victoria Fritz. Nancy Kacungira, Ben Boulos, Samantha Simmonds, Aaron Heslehurst and Alice Baxter act as relief presenters.

response: When the regular presenters were unavailable the show was hosted by Samantha Simmonds, Sarah Hughes, Stephen Dixon.
|It is reported that Andrew Wilson, Lorna Dunkley and Samantha Simmonds are all leaving Sky News as the broadcaster makes financial savings.

link_mentions.page: History of the Jews in Leeds
response: Samantha Simmonds (born 1972/3) grew up in Leeds and attended Leeds Girls' High School. She was news anchor for Sky News, and now presents on BBC News.
